cause.description:
You don't have to donate! Join and discuss energy options. For those who are OFF THE GRID and those who would like to BE off the grid!
OUR AIM IS TO EFFICIENTLY USE THE ENERGY FREELY AVAILABLE THROUGH WATER WIND AND SUN REDUCING THE DEPENDENCE ON FOSSIL FUELS AND MAN-MADE ENERGIES
1. REDUCE DEPENDENCIES ON NON RENEWABLE ENERGIES
2. CREATE A GREENER PLANET
3. OFFER HIGHER STANDARDS OF LIVING TO THOSE COUNTRIES WITHOUT THE "WEALTH" OF FOSSIL FUELS
cause.mission: Get off the grid - reap energy efficiently now!
cause.name: GOT GREEN!
